en: One of the reasons Twitter is popular in Japan is a characteristic of Japanese itself: Japanese uses ideograms which enable it to convey more information in just 140 characters than other languages, not counting Chinese. Incidentally, the Japanese version of this sentence is written with exactly 140 characters. How many characters does it take in other languages?
zh: 推特在日本流行的原因之一是日语本身的一个特点：日语使用表意文字，这使得它能够在短短140个字符中传达比其他语言更多的信息，不包括中文。 顺便说一句，这句话的日文版本正好写了140个字符。 其他语言需要多少个字符？

zh: 至于罪犯，我现在也不知道该如何解读他的行为。

en: "Perhaps we'd better not tell Tom anything about today." "I agree."
zh: “也许我们最好不要告诉汤姆今天的事情。” “我同意。”

en: "Maybe it's better not to tell Tom anything about today." "I think so too."
zh: “也许最好不要告诉汤姆今天的事情。” “我也这么认为。”

en: Do you care what other people think about us?
zh: 你在乎别人怎么看我们吗？

en: No matter what may happen, you mustn't forget your smile.
zh: 无论发生什么事，你都不能忘记微笑。

en: No matter what happens, don't forget to smile.
zh: 无论发生什么事，都不要忘记微笑。

en: I don't think anyone can understand self-harm, unless they do it themselves.
zh: 我觉得除非亲身经历，否则没人能理解自残。

en: Please help conserve water.
zh: 请节约用水。

en: I'm happy when you do that.
zh: 你那样做的时候，我很高兴。

en: Isaac Newton was born on December 25, 1642.
zh: 艾萨克·牛顿出生于1642年12月25日。

en: Where did you buy these shoes?
zh: 你这些鞋在哪儿买的？

en: Industrial emissions cause air pollution.
zh: 工业排放导致空气污染。

en: My money has been stolen.
zh: 我的钱被偷了。

en: There's no reason to feel embarrassed. Your pronunciation is generally correct.
zh: 没必要感到尴尬。你的发音总体上是正确的。

en: Tom was feeling down because Mary made fun of his hair style.
zh: 汤姆心情不好，因为玛丽取笑他的发型。

en: Whatcha readin'?
zh: 你看啥呢？

en: Drinking warm milk will help you get to sleep.
zh: 喝杯热牛奶能帮助你入睡。

en: If you drink warm milk before you go to bed, it'll help you fall asleep.
zh: 如果你睡前喝杯热牛奶，它会帮助你入睡。

en: I thought so, too.
zh: 我也是这么想的。

en: I respect all who always give it their best.
zh: 我尊重所有总是尽力而为的人。

en: If I'd known the truth, I would've told it to you.
zh: 如果我当时知道真相，我就会告诉你了。

en: They're reading his book.
zh: 他们在读他的书。

en: Tom decided not to say anything until he knew more about the situation.
zh: 汤姆决定在更多地了解情况之前什么也不说。

en: Tom waited until Mary was out of earshot before he started talking.
zh: 汤姆等到玛丽听不见了才开始说话。

en: You're supposed to meet Tom in front of his hotel in about an hour.
zh: 你应该在一个小时左右在他酒店前和汤姆见面。

en: You're supposed to have this poem memorized before our next class.
zh: 你应该在下节课之前把这首诗背下来。

en: You're supposed to always pay your rent on the first of the month.
zh: 你应该总是在每月的第一天支付房租。

en: Tom opened the window even though his mother told him not to.
zh: 汤姆打开了窗户，即使他妈妈告诉他不要这样做。

en: The person reading a book on the bench under the tree is Tom.
zh: 在树下长椅上看书的人是汤姆。

en: Tom hadn't eaten anything the whole day and was very hungry.
zh: 汤姆一整天都没吃东西，非常饿。

en: Does Tom know why Mary doesn't want to go to Boston with us?
zh: 汤姆知道玛丽为什么不想和我们一起去波士顿吗？

en: You're supposed to knock before you enter someone's office.
zh: 进别人办公室前应该先敲门。

en: Tom worked from early in the morning until late at night.
zh: 汤姆从一大早就开始工作，一直工作到深夜。

en: Tom was nervous, but he knew what he was supposed to do.
zh: 汤姆很紧张，但他知道自己应该做什么。

en: Which side of the plate is the spoon supposed to be on?
zh: 勺子应该放在盘子的哪一边？

en: Tom quietly closed the bedroom door.
zh: 汤姆悄悄地关上了卧室的门。

en: Do you mind if I try this on?
zh: 我能试穿一下这个吗？

en: Are you allergic to anything?
zh: 你对什么过敏吗？

en: Should I call an ambulance?
zh: 我应该叫救护车吗？

en: What's this called?
zh: 这个叫什么？

en: Do you fish?
zh: 你钓鱼吗？

en: It looks like it might rain, so don't forget your umbrella.
zh: 看起来好像要下雨，所以别忘了带伞。

en: Do you know who this belongs to?
zh: 你知道这是谁的吗？

en: Do you know whose this is?
zh: 你知道这是谁的吗？

en: It looks like today will be a long day.
zh: 看来今天会是很长的一天。

en: "Where's Rio de Janeiro?" "It's in Brazil."
zh: “里约热内卢在哪里？”“在巴西。”

en: Jim always avoids trouble at all costs.
zh: 吉姆总是千方百计地避免麻烦。

en: Although Tom liked to sing very much, no one wanted to listen to him.
zh: 虽然汤姆非常喜欢唱歌，但没有人想听他唱。

en: Tom loved to sing, but nobody wanted to listen to his singing.
zh: 汤姆喜欢唱歌，但是没有人想听他唱歌。

en: Tom loved singing. However, no one wanted to listen to him sing.
zh: 汤姆喜欢唱歌。然而，没有人想听他唱歌。

en: Tom put his hand on Mary's shoulder.
zh: 汤姆把手放在玛丽的肩膀上。

en: I'll go change my clothes.
zh: 我去换件衣服。

en: Inspired by Asian religions, he created beautiful sculptures.
zh: 受亚洲宗教的启发，他创作了美丽的雕塑。

en: I've told you a million times not to exaggerate.
zh: 我已经跟你说过一百万遍不要夸张了。

en: Do you, by any chance, speak French?
zh: 请问，你会说法语吗？

en: The meeting continued late into the night.
zh: 会议一直持续到深夜。

en: The earlier I go to bed, the earlier I get up.
zh: 我越早睡觉，就越早起床。

en: Arabic isn't a difficult language.
zh: 阿拉伯语不是一门很难的语言。

en: French is definitely not a difficult language.
zh: 法语绝对不是一门很难的语言。

en: Khaw San is on medical leave, so I am alone in the office.
zh: Khaw San请病假了，所以现在办公室只有我一个人。

en: I am fasting today.
zh: 我今天斋戒。

en: No smoking in the theater.
zh: 剧院内禁止吸烟。

en: What are your plans for today?
zh: 你今天有什么计划？

en: What's the plan for today?
zh: 今天有什么计划？

en: What's on the schedule for today?
zh: 今天有什么安排？

en: What are our plans for today?
zh: 我们今天有什么计划？

en: What's today's plan?
zh: 今天的计划是什么？

en: "Is it OK to eat this mushroom?" "It's OK to eat anything once."
zh: “这个蘑菇可以吃吗？” “什么东西都可以吃一次。”

en: "Can I eat this mushroom?" "You can eat anything one time."
zh: “我可以吃这个蘑菇吗？” “任何东西你都可以吃一次。”

en: “Hey listen! Tom asked me out on a date to go to the aquarium - in my dream.” “What, so it was just a dream?”
zh: “嘿，听着！汤姆约我去水族馆约会——在我的梦里。” “什么，所以只是个梦？”

en: In Japan, it's now 3:00 a.m.
zh: 现在日本是凌晨三点。

en: May we go now?
zh: 我们可以走了吗？

en: Did the interview go well?
zh: 面试顺利吗？

en: Are you going in?
zh: 你要进去吗？

en: It's nice to meet you too.
zh: 很高兴认识你。

en: Do you want to go again?
zh: 你想再去一次吗？

en: How much is this clock?
zh: 这个钟多少钱？

en: How much does this watch cost?
zh: 这块手表多少钱？

en: I'd do anything for you, Tom.
zh: 为了你，汤姆，我什么都愿意做。

en: What noise do giraffes make?
zh: 长颈鹿发出什么声音？

en: What sound does a giraffe make?
zh: 长颈鹿发出什么样的声音？

en: Tom was the last person I expected to see.
zh: 我最想不到会见到汤姆。

en: Tell me the reason why Tom was fired.
zh: 告诉我汤姆被解雇的原因。

en: Please tell me why Tom was fired.
zh: 请告诉我汤姆被解雇的原因。

en: Tom was anxious to meet you.
zh: 汤姆很渴望见到你。

en: I got to know Tom when I was a college student.
zh: 我大学的时候认识了汤姆。

en: I got to know Tom when I was a university student.
zh: 我大学的时候认识了汤姆。

en: I got to know Tom when I was in college.
zh: 我上大学的时候认识了汤姆。

en: Tom's behavior never ceases to surprise me.
zh: 汤姆的行为总是让我感到惊讶。

en: You don't have to pay attention to what Tom says.
zh: 你不必在意汤姆说的话。

en: I don't know anything about Tom's past.
zh: 我对汤姆的过去一无所知。

en: Tom hasn't had much education.
zh: 汤姆没受过多少教育。

en: Tom never drinks alcohol.
zh: 汤姆从不喝酒。

en: Tom always treats me like a child.
zh: 汤姆总是把我当小孩看待。

en: Tom is always daydreaming.
zh: 汤姆总是做白日梦。

en: Tom ironed his pants.
zh: 汤姆熨了他的裤子。

en: Tom went shopping at a department store.
zh: 汤姆去百货商店购物了。

en: Tom was welcome wherever he went.
zh: 汤姆无论走到哪里都受欢迎。

en: No matter where Tom goes, he has a good reputation.
zh: 无论汤姆去哪里，他都有很好的声誉。

en: Tom plays the piano very well.
zh: 汤姆钢琴弹得很好。

en: Tom was good at playing the violin.
zh: 汤姆擅长拉小提琴。

en: Tom was good at violin.
zh: 汤姆擅长小提琴。

en: Tom was reading a newspaper in his pajamas.
zh: 汤姆穿着睡衣在看报纸。

en: Tom sat on the bench and crossed his legs.
zh: 汤姆坐在长凳上，翘起了二郎腿。

en: Tom took a lot of pictures in Boston.
zh: 汤姆在波士顿拍了很多照片。

en: Tom lived in the center of Boston.
zh: 汤姆住在波士顿市中心。
